title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1800.2 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1800.2 - Scope

State Regulations

The following rules and regulations are applicable to all
municipalities, agencies, and their instrumentalities, irrespective of whether
or not they receive State financial assistance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1800.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
